atlantic-pulse.title: Atlantic Pulse
atlantic-pulse.subtitle: The U.S. Political Idea Competition Forecast

the-4x-gap.title: The 4× Gap
the-4x-gap.subtitle: How Trump's communications outpaced journalistic response by a factor of four, measured across 16 ideology dimensions and 93,500 articles.
the-4x-gap.author: Alen Vukovic

the-4x-gap.og_description: 93,500 articles. 16 ideology dimensions. Trump shifted 4× faster than journalism.

thesis-confidence-ist-die-strkste-emotio.title: Confidence as Dominant Emotion

thesis-confidence-ist-die-strkste-emotio.author: Alen Vukovic
thesis-confidence-ist-die-strkste-emotio.description: Quantitative analysis of emotional patterns in Trump's Trust Social posts, examining whether confidence dominates the emotional spectrum.
thesis-confidence-ist-die-strkste-emotio.og_description: Is confidence the strongest emotion in Trump's 2025 Trust Social posts? A quantitative content analysis.
